A

AbstractRayTracerProducer - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer
AbstractRayTracerProducer implements IRayTracerProducer interface and specifies object which are capable to create scene snapshots by using ray-tracing technique.
AbstractRayTracerProducer() - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.AbstractRayTracerProducer
 

C

calculateRGB(short[], short[], short[], Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Scene, double, double, int, int) - Method in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.AbstractRayTracerProducer
Method which accepts arrays which represents intensity of red, blue and green color and calculates values for every pixel defined with other parameters.
calculateRGB(short[], short[], short[], Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Scene, double, double, int, int) - Method in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.ParallelRayTracerProducer
 
calculateRGB(short[], short[], short[], Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Scene, double, double, int, int) - Method in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.SequentialRayTracerProducer
 
calculateRGBFromTo(short[], short[], short[], Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, Scene, double, double, int, int, int, int) - Method in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.AbstractRayTracerProducer
Method which accepts arrays which represents intensity of red, blue and green color and calculates values for every pixel defined with other parameters.

P

ParallelRayTracerProducer - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer
ParallelRayTracerProducer extends AbstractRayTracerProducer and provides concrete implementation of abstract method defined by its super-class.
ParallelRayTracerProducer() - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.ParallelRayTracerProducer
Creates new ParallelRayTracerProducer with initial ForkJoinPool used for parallel calculation.
produce(Point3D, Point3D, Point3D, double, double, int, int, long, IRayTracerResultObserver) - Method in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.AbstractRayTracerProducer
 

R

RayCaster - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer
RayCaster is command line application which shows a predefined scene with spheres modeled by Sphere class and multiply light sources modeled by LightSource class.
RayCaster() - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.RayCaster
 
RayCasterParallel - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer
RayCasterParallel is command line application which shows a predefined scene with spheres modeled by Sphere class and multiply light sources modeled by LightSource class.
RayCasterParallel() - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.RayCasterParallel
 
RayTracer - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer
RayTracer class offers public method RayTracer.tracer(Scene, Ray, short[]) which traces specified Ray and sets color intensities on calculated values.
RayTracer() - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.RayTracer
 

S

SequentialRayTracerProducer - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer
SequentialRayTracerProducer extends AbstractRayTracerProducer and provides concrete implementation of abstract method defined by its super-class.
SequentialRayTracerProducer() - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.SequentialRayTracerProducer
 
Sphere - Class in hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model
Class Sphere models sphere in 3D coordinate system.
Sphere(Point3D, double, double, double, double, double, double, double, double) - Constructor for class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.model.Sphere
Creates new Sphere in 3D coordinate system with specified center point, radius and coefficients for reflective and diffuse light components.

T

tracer(Scene, Ray, short[]) - Static method in class hr.fer.zemris.java.raytracer.RayTracer
Traces specified Ray given as argument and searches for intersections with objects which are defined in specified Scene.
